situation.title: Business trips abroad
situation.meta_description: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic has launched a new free service that will help Czech companies with visas even where countries do not currently issue the necessary documents.

situation.title: Airports
situation.meta_description: Find out what rules apply to you before entering a foreign country (e.g. PCR test, quarantine, etc.) on the Traveler's Map. Also, check the current hygiene measures at the airport.

situation.title: Slovakia
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for the people arriving to and departing from Slovakia.

situation.title: Border commuters
situation.meta_description: If you are one of the commuters, it is recommended to continuously check the website of the embassy of the country in which you work. Conditions change dynamically.

situation.title: Visas
situation.meta_description: Visa services can only be fully renewed at the embassies of the so-called "green states", i.e. those with a low risk of contracting COVID-19.

situation.title: Family or partner abroad
situation.meta_description: If you need to travel to your family or partner in necessary cases, check what rules apply in individual countries on the Traveler's Map.

situation.title: Crossing the green border
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for crossing the green border.

situation.title: Students abroad
situation.meta_description: Contact the relevant foreign school or institution before the planned trip, and check whether the lessons are taking place and what the current conditions are.
